## ProgressIndicatorService.clearMessages() method

Clears all messages for progress group

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clearMessages(name?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | Name of progress group (separate counter) |
